title: Sharing The Darkness
description: Teo Sandoval's unearthly power caused storms to rage and lightning to tear across the sky. Tall, dark and brooding, he was called the devil's spawn by some. His laughter held no humor, and conjured images of smoke and fire. He wanted nothing to do with society. Until one night Melanie Daniels swept into his life, pleading for his helpâ€¦
author: Marilyn Tracy
